title: (Minister of State at the Department of Health) (No. 2) Order 2022.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 

(Minister of State at the Department of Health) (No. 2) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department health) (no 2) order 2022

title: (Minister of State at the Department of Health) (No. 2) Order 2022.
heading: 2. Corona Joyce, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Corona Joyce, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Health, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to 
Mary Butler, Minister of State at the Department of Health, with effect from 7 
September 2022. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

13 December, 2022. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 16th December, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [740] 3
text_norm: 2 corona joyce particular whose address deposited office department health appointed special adviser mary butler minister state department health effect 7 september 2022 given official seal government 13 december 2022 micheal martin taoiseach notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 16th december 2022 740 3

title: (Minister of State at the Department of Health) (No. 2) Order 2022.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

The purpose of this Order is to appoint a Special Adviser to the Minister of 
State at the Department of Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [740]
